deleteAccount.helpText: Deleting your account is like breaking a Wookah bowl. Painful, expensive and irreversible. Do you really want to say goodbye to us forever?

Product.description: Have you been wanting to try a natural, tangy pineapple? Black Burn has released a new explosive flavor that will immediately hit your top list. From the very first inhale, you'll be filled with a pleasant sourness and light sweetness that will last throughout the entire session!

About.title: About us
About.subtitle: Overpack
About.tagline: Your trusted partner in the world of hookah
About.description: Overpack is a modern online store for hookah products, where quality meets convenience. We offer a wide range of products from trusted manufacturers and guarantee fast delivery throughout Armenia.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: To provide our customers with only the best hookah products, ensuring a high level of service and individual approach to each order.

quality.title: Quality
quality.text: Only original products from trusted manufacturers

service.title: Service
service.text: Personal approach and support at every stage

trust.title: Reliability
trust.text: Honesty and transparency in all relationships
